name: V_EHI_OVR_LINKED_RQGS
description: Placeholder view for OVR EHI data that needs to be marked as both static and dynamic.

columns.name: RESULT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the result record.

columns.name: GROUPER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the non-participating submitter's patient (RQG) associated with the result record.

columns.name: CM_LOG_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The Community ID (CID) of the instance from which this record or line was extracted. This is only populated if you use IntraConnect.
